EPOCHS: ancient obsidian shrine eroded by time
end-of-days sky vault filled with ash and drifting feathers
OUTFITS: torn ceremonial straps fused with pale wounded skin
decayed lace restraints soaked with dried blood
fragmented ritual armor of bone and cracked leather
minimal black bands cutting into arms, thighs and neck
sacrificial shroud shredded into long drifting ribbons
organic growths of cartilage and scar tissue along the spine
LIGHTING: soft volumetric godrays cutting through dust and smoke
dim cold backlight outlining the fallen silhouette
single overhead halo-light casting deep funereal shadows
subtle rim light catching feathers, scars and wounds
faint ambient glow as if from dying candles
low-contrast monochrome glow with heavy film grain
BACKGROUNDS: endless dark void filled with drifting black feathers
shallow pool of reflective blood-dark liquid
cracked marble floor lost in incense fog
faint ritual sigils barely visible beneath hair and skin
collapsing feather storm swirling in slow motion
minimal desaturated gradient fading into nothingness
OBJECTS: thorny organic tendrils piercing skin and wings
heavy rusted chains wrapped around limbs
fractured halo made of bone and ash
blood-stained feathers clinging to wet skin
ritual scars carved deeply along the spine
exposed rib cage bound by sinew and scar tissue
POSES: crouched in a fetal position, knees tight to the chest
sitting on the ground with arms hanging loose, head bowed
kneeling with shoulders collapsed inward in surrender
curled sideways, hair spilling like a pale veil
leaning forward as if listening to distant prayers
motionless, suspended in the moment after the fall
EXPRESSIONS: eyes hidden behind hair, unreadable and distant
hollow luminous gaze dulled by sorrow
subtle grimace of restrained spiritual pain
emotionless mask fractured by silent despair
detached sacred calm despite visible wounds
CAMERA_ANGLES: low angle emphasizing wings and collapsed posture
eye-level close-up focused on face and scars
three-quarter side view revealing ribs and wings
slightly top-down framing the fallen body in isolation
extreme close-up on scarred chest and collarbones
centered medium shot with wings fading out of frame
ATMOSPHERES: dense suffocating air heavy with ash and incense
reverent silence broken only by imagined echoes
ACCESSORIES: tattered blindfold partially soaked in blood
rusted iron collar chained to nothing
thin black rosary-like bands wrapped around limbs
ritual piercings along ears, ribs and collarbones
wax-dripped candles embedded in the ground nearby
ashes clinging to skin and hair

SENSUALITY_LEVEL.1: suggested femininity through posture and fabric
SENSUALITY_LEVEL.3: decadent elegance with subtle erotic tension, never explicit

HORROR_INTENSITY.0: Ethereal melancholy, fallen grace, minimal wounds and spiritual decay.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: Visible body trauma, exposed ribs, scars and blood, tragic and intimate.
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: Extreme fallen body horror, open wounds, ritual mutilation and sacred desecration.
